heading: (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Road Traffic (Licensing of
text_raw:
1. 

(1) These Regulations may be cited as the Road Traffic (Licensing of 

Drivers) (Amendment) (No. 10) Regulations 2020. 

(2) These Regulations come into operation on 30 November 2020.

heading: In these Regulations, “Regulations of 2006” means the Road Traffic
text_raw:
2.

title: Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 351 of 2020)), hereby
heading: 3. The Regulations of 2006 are amended by the substitution of the
text_raw:
3. The Regulations of 2006 are amended by the substitution of the 

following Regulation for Regulation 28: 

“28. (1) A person may apply for a certificate of competency - 

(a) by post, on a form approved by the issuing authority, or 
(b) online, by means of an online application system provided by or 

on behalf of the issuing authority. 

(2) A form or application system referred to in paragraph (1) shall contain 

the particulars specified in Parts 1 and 2 of Schedule 10. 

(3) A person applying for a certificate of competency shall provide the 
particulars set out in Part 1 of Schedule 10 and may provide the particulars set 
out in Part 2 of that Schedule.”.
text_norm: 3 regulation 2006 amended substitution following regulation regulation 28 28 (1) person may apply certificate competency - (a) post form approved issuing authority (b) online mean online application system provided behalf issuing authority (2) form application system referred paragraph (1) shall contain particular specified part 1 2 schedule 10 (3) person applying certificate competency shall provide particular set part 1 schedule 10 may provide particular set part 2 schedule

title: Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 351 of 2020)), hereby
heading: Driver number, being -
text_raw:
1. 

Driver number, being - 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

in the case of a driving licence in scheduled form D.402, the 
number given at item 4d, 

in the case of a driving licence issued before 19 January 2013, 
the number given at item 5 and described as ‘Number’, or 

in the case of a learner permit in scheduled form D.202, the 
number given at item 4d.

heading: A declaration, signed by the applicant, stating that the applicant wishes
text_raw:

or misleading information is an offence.

title: Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 351 of 2020)), hereby
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the Road Traffic (Licensing of Drivers) Regulations 
2006 (S.I. 537 of 2006) in order to enhance the online application system for 
driving tests. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6 [546]
